html:
{% if letter_head %}{{letter_head}}{% endif %}
File No : {{doc.registration_number or ''}}
Applicant Name : {{doc.applicant_name or ''}}
Date : {{ doc.registration_date or '' }}

Sub: - "Jute Mark India" Registration letter

Sir/madam,

  Kindly refer to your application no. {{ doc.application_number or '' }}. This office has completed the on-site verification on {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get('on_site_verification_date'),"dd-MM-yyyy") or ""}}. Based on verification reports and payment of fees, we are happy to register you in the “ Jute Mark India " Scheme with following details:

Registration No {{ doc.registration_number or '' }}
Category {{ doc.category or ''}}
Entitlement of Label {{ doc.no_of_labels or 0 }} Labels

  Please quote this Registration Number in all future correspondence. It may kindly be noted that if the " Jute Mark India " labels issued to you are found misused then " Textiles Committee " has the right to cancel your registration and initiate appropriate legal action.

  We thank you to be a part of the great Indian heritage promotional scheme.







Copy to: Joint Director (TQM), Textiles Committee, Mumbai
Yours faithfully,
{% if doc.ro_username %} {{ doc.ro_username }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.regional_office %} {{ doc.regional_office }} Regional Office
{% endif %}
name: JMI Registration Letter
